projectGridLines.title: AI/ML Engineer - Intern
projectGridLines.description:
As an AI/ML Engineer - Intern, you will do R&D on different AI models which are used by our

competitors to compile them on our compiler. Along with validating different ML models. You

will also be responsible for running and measuring the accuracy of GStreamer based

Applications. This position requires the ability to work with engineers to understand the system

requirements and intended behaviors. This position will require programming using python or

c/C++. Excellent communication skills are necessary to work with different engineering teams.

Responsibilities:

? Work on Machine Learning algorithms such as convolution2D

? Work on Deep Learning Frameworks (tensorflow, mxnet, pytorch, etc.)

? R&D on competitors models and make them compiled on our compiler

? Running and measuring the accuracy of GStreamer based Applications

? Developing new GStreamer based Applications

? Implement compiler scripts using Python

? Add scripts in Jenkins CI/CD job

? Maintain code in BItbucket, tasks in Jira, and documentation in Confluence

Very strong coding skills in C/C++, Python

? Software debugging/troubleshooting skills in Python and/or C++

? Exposure to deep-learning machine technology

? Knowledge of Compiler and Toolchain

? Exposure to Linux OS with Centos and/or Ubuntu systems

? Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
